name: figma-link-cleaner
title: Figma Link Cleaner
description: Clean and shorten Figma URLs instantly. Removes tracking parameters, file slugs, and creates ultra-short fgma.cc links with one hotkey.
author: iamshubhransh

commands.name: clean-figma-link
commands.title: Clean Figma Link
commands.subtitle: Figma
commands.description: Copies the current Figma selection link (via Cmd+L), cleans it by removing tracking params, and optionally shortens via fgma.cc

preferences.name: shortenerEnabled
preferences.title: URL Shortening
preferences.label: Enable fgma.cc shortening
preferences.description: When enabled, cleaned URLs will also be shortened via fgma.cc for even shorter links (e.g., fgma.cc/abc123)

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: API Key (Optional)
preferences.description: Optional API key for fgma.cc authentication. Leave empty for public use.
